name: Iris
temple_description:
Iris was the incarnation of the rainbow in Greek mythology, and ancient people 
believed that she could connect heaven and earth. 
After the formation of the Olympian Pantheon, Iris was regarded as the liaison 
between gods and people. She conveys the will and commands of the gods to 
people. 
She was Hera's envoy, but she merely executes Zeus' and Hera's orders, and her 
personal opinions play no part in her duties.

active_skills.name: Arcane Arrow
active_skills.effect:
Deals 120% P.DMG to 2 enemies with the highest ATK and has a 70% chance 
to stun them for 1 round.

active_skills.name: Devastating Shot
active_skills.effect:
Deals 150% P.DMG to 3 enemies in the front row and has a 50% chance 
to inflict [Bleed], preventing all healing for 2 rounds.
